attributes.action: Refuse to allow a second referendum on the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
It is now known that Those from the leave campaign are not happy with the decision and have set up a petition to ask the government to create a second referendum in order to change the vote.

we the undersigned disagree with this, We live in a democratic country and as such the vote must stand. 

As stated by one of the MP's not so long ago.. "this is a referendum not a neverendum"

We the undersigned hereby request that any request at a second referendum be refused.
attributes.background: On the 23rd June 2016 the UK had a democratic vote, in which the majority voted to leave the EU. Since this is a democratic country this vote should be the final say.
